name: first_operating_year
description: Find the first year a property has positive revenue in its projection, so KPIs display meaningful values instead of $0 for properties acquired mid-model.
when_to_use: Any time you display per-property 'Year 1' KPIs, summary cards, or first-year metrics. Properties acquired after model start have $0 in early years.

usage.return_shape: { index: number, data: T, year: string | number | undefined } | null
